title: "Evaluating various scores of polygenic risk"
output: html_document
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data_dir <- 'simulated-data'
filenames <- list.files(data_dir, pattern = '*.txt', full.names = T)

alpha <- 1 # pvalue threshold
```

Try dataset 3:

```{r}
i <- 1
file_i <- filenames[i]
dat_i <- data.table::fread(file_i)
nvars <- ncol(dat_i) - 1
snps <- colnames(dat_i)[1:nvars]
coef_i <- matrix(NA, nrow = nvars, ncol = 2,
                 dimnames = list(snps, c('beta_univar', 'pval')))
for (snp in snps){
  coef_i[snp, ] <- glm(expr(Class ~ !!sym(snp)), data = dat_i, family = 'binomial') %>%
    summary() %>% 
    with(coefficients) %>%
    .[2, c('Estimate', 'Pr(>|z|)')]
}

betas_i <- coef_i %>%
  data.frame() %>%
  rownames_to_column('att') %>%
  mutate(padj =  p.adjust(pval, method = 'BH')) %>%
  filter(padj < alpha)

prs_i <- dat_i %>%
  dplyr::select(betas_i$att) %>%
  as.matrix() %*% 
  as.matrix(betas_i$beta) 

```


Let's now run STIR:

```{r}
library(npdr)

stir.results <- npdr('Class', dat_i, regression.type="binomial", 
         attr.diff.type = "allele-sharing", nbd.method = "multisurf", 
         nbd.metric = "allele-sharing-manhattan", msurf.sd.frac = .5, 
         padj.method = "bonferroni", verbose = T) 

betas_stir_i <- stir.results %>%
  filter(beta.Z.att > 0) %>%
  merge(coef_i, by.x = 'att', by.y = 'row.names') %>%
  mutate(beta.Z.att.scaled = scale(beta.Z.att, center = F, scale = T)) %>%
  mutate(betas_multiplied = beta.Z.att.scaled * sign(beta_univar))

prs_stir_i <- dat_i %>%
  dplyr::select(betas_stir_i$att) %>%
  as.matrix() %*% 
  as.matrix(betas_stir_i$betas_multiplied) 

data.frame(Class = as.factor(dat_i$Class), 
           Standard_risk = prs_i,
           STIR_risk = prs_stir_i) %>%
  gather('Type', 'Risk', 2:3) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Type, y = Risk, fill = Class)) +
  geom_boxplot()


cor.test(prs_i, dat_i$Class)
cor.test(prs_stir_i, dat_i$Class)
```
